infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of ingredients and dishes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for voice commands and recipe instructions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select images of ingredients.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs access to speech recognition for voice-based recipe search.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos of ingredients and dishes.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to select images of ingredients.
